japanese:
綺麗ですね……。
昨日見ていた太陽と同じもののはずなのに……。
translation:
It's so beautiful...
Even though it should be the 
same sun I saw yesterday...

japanese:
そりゃそうだな。
太陽がいくつもあったら、
地球上に生命が生じることもなかったはずだ。
translation:
Well, that's right.
If there were multiple suns,
life on Earth wouldn't have happened.

japanese: えっ！？
translation: Huh?!

japanese:
やっと見つけたぞ。
こんなところにいたのか。
translation:
I finally found you.
So, you were here.

japanese:
上杉君！？
なぜ、ここに……。
translation:
Uesugi-kun?!
Why are you here?

japanese:
なぜって？
起きたらテントの中にいないから探しに来たんだが？
translation:
Why?
I woke up and you weren't in the tent,
so I came looking for you.

japanese:
別荘にも戻ってない感じだったし……
まったく驚かせやがって。
translation:
It didn't seem like you went back
to the villa either...
Which was a complete surprise.

japanese: すみません……。
translation: Sorry...

japanese: どうしてこんなところにいるんだよ。
translation: Well, why are you here?

japanese:
たまたま、早く目が覚めてしまって。
天気もよいですし、朝日を見られるのではないかと
思いついたんです。
translation:
I happened to wake up early.
The weather is nice,
so I thought I'd be able to see the sunrise.

japanese:
２人ともよく寝ていましたし、
起こすのも申し訳なくて……
ご心配をおかけして、本当にすみません。
translation:
You both were sleeping soundly,
and I didn't want to wake you up...
I'm really sorry for worrying you.

japanese:
まあ、反省してるならそれでいい。
俺もこうして綺麗な朝日を見られたしな。
translation:
Well, as long as you're sorry, that's good enough.
Also, it was nice to see such a
beautiful sunrise like this.

japanese:
ええ、本当に……。
こんな島で、こんな風に朝日を見る機会なんて
滅多にありませんよ。
translation:
Yes, indeed...
You don't often get the chance
to see a sunrise like this on this island.

japanese:
……五月。
昨日はらいはに付き合ってくれて、ありがとな。
translation:
...Itsuki.
Thank you for going along with Raiha's wishes yesterday.

japanese:
改まってお礼を言われるようなことでは
ありませんよ。
translation: You don't need to thank me though.

japanese:
私はただ、キャンプをしたいという
らいはちゃんの望みを叶えただけです。
translation: I simply fulfilled Raiha's wish to go camping.

japanese: それと、俺のことまで守ろうとしなくていいからな。
translation: Also, you don't have to try to protect me.
Huh...?

japanese:
とぼけるな。
昨日、お前がずっと変な行動をしていたのは
俺を守ろうとしていたからだろ？
translation:
Don't play dumb.
Yesterday, you were behaving strangely
the whole time to protect me, right?

japanese: 俺が、お父さんに怒られないように。
translation: So, your father wouldn't scold me.

japanese: それは……どういう……。
translation: What...do you mean...?

japanese:
俺がお父さんから釘を刺されていたことを
知ってるのは、電話を取り次いだお前だけだ。
translation:
You're the only one who knows that
I was reprimanded by your father,
because you took the phone call.

japanese:
だからお前は、俺と他のやつらの間に
無理にでも入り込んで、
事を荒立てないようにしていた――
translation:
Therefore, you forcefully inserted yourself
between me and the others to prevent any trouble%p-2;――

japanese:
つまり、自分が防波堤になろうとしていたわけだ。
違うか？
translation:
In other words, you were trying to act as a barrier
between me and your father.
Am I wrong?

japanese: ……違うのか？
translation: ...Am I wrong?

japanese:
あっ……！
はい、そうです！　上杉君の言う通りです！
translation:
Ah...!
You're right! It's as you say, Uesugi-kun!

japanese: やっぱり、そうか。
translation: I see. As I expected.

japanese:
……俺のために、そうやって
立ち回ってくれてたのは、ありがたいと思ってる。
translation:
...I appreciate that you conducted things
in that way, trying to protect me.

japanese: でも、だからって、自分を犠牲にするのは違うだろ。
translation: However, sacrificing yourself is not the way to do it.

japanese:
俺を守るために、お前ら姉妹の関係が
ギクシャクしてたら本末転倒だ。
translation:
If your sisterly relationship was strained
because you were trying to protect me,
that'd be completely counterproductive.

japanese:
守ってもらってた側の俺が、
こんなことを言う資格はないのかもしれないが。
translation:
I may not have the right to say this, though,
being the one who was protected.

japanese:
いえ……。
あなたの言う通りです。
translation:
No...
You're completely right.

japanese:
私の事情のために、色々と無理なことも
言ったりしていましたから。
translation:
Because of my circumstances,
I said and did unreasonable things.

japanese:
特に……二乃と三玖には
悪いことをしてしまいました。
translation:
I...especially did something bad
towards Nino and Miku.

japanese: ……その、二乃と三玖についてだけどな？
translation: ...About Nino and Miku, though?

japanese:
俺もあいつらの気持ちというか、
その……俺に対する望みというか、
その辺は、わかってるつもりだし――
translation:
I think I understand their feelings, or...
rather what they desire from me%p-2;――

japanese: 俺なりに、向き合う覚悟はしているつもりだ。
translation: I'm prepared to face them in my own way.

japanese: ですが、そんな簡単なものでは……。
translation: Yet, it's not that simple...

japanese:
それもわかってる。
だから、安易な行動を取って２人を傷つける
ようなことはしないと、約束する。
translation:
I understand that too. That's why I promise
not to act irresponsibly and hurt them.

japanese: 上杉君……。
translation: Uesugi-kun...

japanese:
……困りましたね。
そんな風に、まっすぐ言われてしまうとは。
translation:
...I don't know what to say.
I didn't expect you to be so straightforward.

japanese: 私ばかり……空回りしていたみたいです。
translation: It seems like...I've just been going around in circles.

japanese: 五月……？
translation: Itsuki...?

japanese:
ありがとうございます。
上杉君の真剣な気持ちと気遣いは、
きちんと受け取りました。
translation:
Thank you very much.
Your sincere feelings and consideration 
were well receieved, Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
これは、上杉君にはあまりにも難しい問題です。
答えを出すまで、まだ時間がかかるでしょう。
translation:
This is a difficult problem for you, Uesugi-kun.
It will take some time to find the answer.

japanese:
けれどあなたは、必ず答えを出してくれる。
今日、そう確信できただけでも安心です。
translation:
However, I'm sure you will find the answer.
Just knowing that today has given me peace of mind.

japanese: ……おう。
translation: ...Hey.

japanese:
あー、その、話がズレちまったけどな？
お前も全部を抱え込もうとするんじゃないぞ。
translation:
Ah, that is, this conversation has gotten off track, huh?
Don't try to shoulder everything yourself.

japanese:
母親のようにみんなを導くつもりでも、
お前自身も五つ子のうちの１人で、
俺にとっても、５人の生徒の１人だ。
translation:
Even if you try to lead everyone like a mother,
you are also one of the quintuplets,
and for me, one of my five students.

japanese:
ええ……。
ありがとうございます、上杉君。
translation:
Yes...
Thank you, Uesugi-kun.

japanese: ……いつも頑張りすぎなんだよ、お前は。
translation: ...You always trying too hard, Itsuki.

japanese:
うんうん！
お兄ちゃんの言う通りだよ。
translation:
Yeah, yeah!
It's as big bro says.

japanese:
らいはちゃん！？
いつの間に……。
translation:
Raiha-chan?!
When did you get here...

japanese:
お兄ちゃんがテントを出たときには、
私も起きてたからねー。
translation: Since big bro left the tent, I've been awake, ya know.

japanese:
五月さんもいないから、気になって
お兄ちゃんのあとを追いかけてきたんだ。
translation:
I was curious because you weren't there, Itsuki-san,
so I followed him.

japanese: そ、そうだったのか。
translation: I-is that so?

japanese:
それより！
五月さん、お兄ちゃんみたいに頑張りすぎるのは
本当にダメだからね？
translation:
Anyway!
Itsuki-san, you know it's really not good
to try as hard as big bro does, right?

japanese:
うっ……。
すみません、らいはちゃんにまで言わせてしまって。
translation:
Ooh...
I'm sorry for making you say that, Raiha-chan.

japanese:
ホント、お兄ちゃんと五月さんって
そういうところ、そっくりだよねぇ。
translation: Really, you and big bro are so alike in that way.

japanese:
はあ？
いやいや、似てはいないだろ。
translation:
Huh?
No, no, we're not alike.

japanese:
そうですよ。
私と上杉君が似てるだなんて、
そんなことあり得ません。
translation:
That's right.
It's impossible for me and Uesugi-kun
to be similar in that way.

japanese:
ううん、似てるよ～？
夫婦もずっと一緒にいると似てくるって言うし、
やっぱりお似合いってことだね。
translation:
No, but you are? They say married couples
become similar after being together for so long,
so you're well matched.

japanese: なっ！？
translation: Wha?!

japanese:
ちょっと待て、らいは！
いま聞き捨てならない単語が聞こえたぞ！？
どこでそんな言葉を覚えてきたんだ！
translation:
Wait a minute, Raiha!
I just heard a word that I can't let slip by!
Where did you learn that word?!

japanese:
そもそも、らいはちゃんは勘違いをしています！
私と上杉君はそういう関係ではありません！！
translation:
First off, you are totally mistaken, Raiha-chan!
Uesugi-kun and I don't have that kind of relationship!!

japanese:
そっかそっかー。
でも、まだってこともあるよね。
未来のことは誰にもわかんないもん。
translation:
I see, I see.
But, you never know, right?
No one knows what the future holds.

japanese: ら、らいはちゃーん！？
translation: R-Raiha-chan?!
